## Overview
I learned R by taking *Data Science I* (P8105)  last semester which is taught by Dr. Jeff Goldsmith. In this course, I learnt how to do data manipulation and data visualization by R. Besides, I have taken Data Science Specialization on Cousera which is developed by Johns Hopkins University.

During this semester, I' m taking *Data Science II* (P8106) which is taught by Dr. Yifei Sun, learning something about data modeling.
